def_cn: (人)暴君似的，专横的，残暴的
def_en: If you describe someone as tyrannical, you mean that they are severe or unfair towards the people that they have authority over.

def_cn: (政府或组织)专制的，暴政的，暴虐的
def_en: If you describe a government or organization as tyrannical, you mean that it acts without considering the wishes of its people and treats them cruelly or unfairly.
